episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Roark were
looking for a good place for Rock-type Pokemon
to train...
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_02: Nice! Somewhere around here looks good—
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_04: Hey. It’s been a while, Roark.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_05: I was in the middle of training...did I surprise you?
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_06:
Lucario has been oddly into it, maybe because he
felt your auras.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_07:
I didn’t know you were here on Pasio! When did
that happen?
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_08: Yeah, I was led here by a mysterious power...
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_11:
I’m Riley. I’m a Trainer, and yes, it is a bit odd
that I’m always training in mines.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_0401_13: Nice to meet you too. I’ve heard about you.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_0402_15: Hmm, you seem a bit down.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_0402_16:
Are you eating a balanced diet? Make sure you
don’t miss any nutrients!
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_17: Riley’s a friend of my dad’s.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_18:
Riley’s such a good Trainer that my dad asked him
to be a Gym Leader.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_20:
I’m planning to continue training with Lucario as a
sync pair on Pasio.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_21:
There may be times when I need help, so I’ll be
counting on you two.
episode_event_ch0156_00_gen/4001_1001_23: No better time than the present, right?
